newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: ONE KILLED IN AJAX-FEYENOORD SOCCER VIOLENCE.
newsitem.headline: ONE KILLED IN AJAX-FEYENOORD SOCCER VIOLENCE.

text.p: One man died and dozens were injured during violent clashes between supporters of rival first-division clubs Ajax Amsterdam and Feyenoord Rotterdam on wasteground along the A9 motorway near Amsterdam, the Dutch news agency ANP said on Sunday.
Hundreds of fans armed with baseball bats and clubs streamed to the pre-arranged venue for a showdown ahead of Feyenoord's match against FC Alkmaar later today, it said.
Police, who had been prepared for a clash between the rival supporters at a different venue, were taken unawares, ANP said.
It said several fans wounded in the clash had been taken to hospital in Beverwijk to be treated for stab wounds.
Several cars had been set alight, it added.
A police spokesman told Reuters the situation was still too confused to give details.
"It is still very confused and chaotic," he said. REUTER
